minecraft:texture_set.title: Texture Set
minecraft:texture_set.description: Texture Sets are used to define multiple PBR layers for a texture resource.

color.title: Color
color.description: This is an RGB 3-channel image (defaults to uniform alpha of 1.0), or an RGBA 4-channel image, or a 4 value array for a uniform color with alpha.

normal.title: Normal Map
normal.description: This is a 3-channel normal map image (or 4-channel where the 4th channel is ignored). This layer and the "heightmap" layer should not both be defined at the same time.

heightmap.title: Heightmap
heightmap.description: 1-channel layer image or a single value in this JSON file for a uniform heightmap. This layer and the "normal" layer should not both be defined at the same time.

mer.title: Metalness Emissive Roughness
mer.description: This is a 3-channel image (or 4-channel where the 4th channel is ignored) or a 3-value array for a uniform MER. RGB images map Red to Metalness, Green to Emissive, and Blue to Roughness.

mers.title: Metalness Emissive Roughness Subsurface
mers.description: This is a 4-channel image or a 4-value array for a uniform MERS. RGBA images map Red to Metalness, Green to Emissive, Blue to Roughness and Alpha to Subsurface.
